title: Adventures in Bodybuilding
description: There's nothing like friendship between men: come join me on a trip through the favorite memories of my youth.

images.desc: Ah, I remember this well. Pasquale is about to crack cold fusion. What fun we had discussing those mathematical subtleties!
A lot of emotion here! The group had been debating nature versus nurture. Our teacher managed to calm us down and mutual understanding won the day.
It's my dear friend Thimo. He's on an easter egg hunt. I've always admired the strength of his hands.
Liutauras was the gentlest of us all. Here he is cleaning his glasses: with focus like his, not a speck went unnoticed.
We were all cheering Robbe on as he piloted the submarine. As long as he was happy, we were happy. Sincerity and friendship are our strength!
James-Alexander was never afraid of the unknown. I can still hear him, a melodic timbre to his voice, waxing poetic about the empty void between atoms.
While exploring his passions, Jacques became entirely oblivious to the world around him. So profoundly deep and intellectual were his tastes.
Oskar never could resist a piano. While we were dining, he was filling the world around him with the whimsy of his musical imagination.
Synchronous golfing was all the rage back then. In the quiet of the golf course, the sounds of balls being wacked formed a symphony of delight.
Look how proud Mykhaylo is! And rightly so: he had just synthesised a new biofuel that was both clean and cost-effective.
Holding to the rigours of the scientific method, every bit of work was peer reviewed. No effort is too much if it brings us closer to the universal truth!
